name: Fur's Fate
description:
The cat's name is Lilly, she's very adorable and always unaware about the dangers of the world.  Very innocent and dorky, everything for her is perfectly normal, even though she has, since a kitten, contact with demons, spirits, entities and gods. She worships an entity called "Nihasa". 

The entity is called Nihasa, and well, they are a demon. A cat demon. They are the one who proposes to Lilly to do a ritual, which in turn, would give her powers. They don't expect her to actually do it, since they think she is too stupid to manage that. They don't care that much about their followers too.

The owners are... Not that intelligent. I guess it suits the cat. They're very common and don't have any interesting features to be commented on. What a shame.

The Team - Luzitana

Luzitana is a group of students from IFRJ, majoring in Digital Games, located in Rio de Janeiro - Frontin Campus.

Producer: Anna Loureiro (Revian)
Game Designers: Anna Loureiro (Revian), Gabriel Adonai, George Santos
2D Art: Anna Loureiro (Revian)
3D Art: Giovanne Picolo, Alice Castanheira
Programmers: Alexandre Prata
Sound Design: George Santos

Thank you very much to my friends for the help, ZVK and Celsius.
